CHAT.comment: JEFFREY K. SKILLING, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 1:00 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SRI SRINIVASAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL R. DREEBEN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SRI SRINIVASAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 2:00 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
